description: Variation of Condition 2 (DRAWING NUMBERS) of Planning Permission Ref.  P2024/0690 dated 16/08/2024 for 'Single storey rear and side extension and replacement dormer loft extension with a single rooflight to the front roof slope. Installation of solar panels and air source heat pump and timber double glazed sash windows. Replacement bin and bike storage in the front garden.' Amendments to include alterations to the design and appearance of the rear roof dormer and rear extension
decision_conditions:
The development shall be constructed in accordance with the schedule of materials noted on the plans and within the Design and Access Statement. The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved and shall be maintained as such thereafter. 

REASON: In the interest of securing sustainable development and to ensure that the resulting appearance and construction of the development is of a high standard.
